ygData.subject: Re: new
ygData.msgSnippet: I made so much money i was giving armor away to my real life friends, and have 50plat in bank and an inventory to boot. Marketing is the hard part.  Get ready
ygData.messageBody:
I made so much money i was giving armor away to my real life friends, and
have 50plat in bank and an inventory to boot.

Marketing is the hard part. Get ready to log on and do nothing but run
around selling, for hours on end.

At 09:25 AM 5/4/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
>Early on its very unprofitable and very frustrating but once you get to the
>70's it starts to become profitable
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Keith R. [SMTP:blue@...]
>> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 8:41 AM
>> To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>> Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] new
>>
>> From: "Keith R." <blue@...>
>>
>> Hail. I joined this list because I am considering taking up the
>> blacksmithing trade. I haven't read that much on the subject , but I have
>> read that blacksmithing is not very profitable. Is this true? I'm
>> willing
>> to be patient and invest time in it.
>>
>> Thanks.
>>
>>
